About

Software engineer focused on backend systems and data.

I mostly work on APIs and data models, and I tend to be more comfortable with document-based databases than relational ones.

Technologies

  • MongoDB (primary database)
  • SQL (basic working knowledge)
  • GraphQL and REST APIs
  • Vue.js
  • AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB)
  • CloudFormation (infrastructure as code)
  • Python, JavaScript

This site is mainly a place to document projects and experiments, and to keep track of things I’ve learned while building them.

Andrew Martinez

Software engineer focused on cloud-native systems, ingestion pipelines, and multi-tenant SaaS platforms.

Oakland, CA
